comments.body: For future reference, we should put test cases like this in a separate `Bugs.scala` file (name up for debate) where we only append new code. Adding a new line to Types.scala shifts all positions in the following statements which causes unnecessary diffs making it harder to review the changes.
I agree: it's also probably interesting to keep track of this bugs (and respective workaround) in case they get fixed upstream
